price: Sε anka worehunu sεdeε ehu bεsi abͻ wͻn, (na saa berε no) dwane kͻbea (biara) nni hͻ a; yεbεsͻ wͻn mu wͻ bea bi a εbεn paa.
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw tarā idh faziʿū falā fawta wa-ukhidhū min makānin qarībin
